entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse I have the distinct feeling Trump wishes to see my family dead.

124000 Covid-19 deaths and you did nothing

Gun violence rampant in the USA and you did nothing

Police brutality against minorities and you did nothing

Heath care costs and ins. skyrocketing and you do nothing
